trans-unit.source: Represents the kind of event that has occurred on a view of a control at design time.
trans-unit.target: コントロールのビューのデザイン時に発生したイベントの種類を表します。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: このクラスは継承できません。

trans-unit.source: A ViewEvent object is provided to the designer component by the design host, for example [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)], when raising an event caused by certain user actions on the design-time view of a control.
trans-unit.target: ViewEvent オブジェクトはデザイナー コンポーネントをホストで提供される、デザイン、たとえば[!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]コントロールのデザイン時ビューの特定のユーザー アクションによって発生するイベントを発生させる場合、します。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>によってイベントが処理される、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>デリゲートを受け取るメソッド、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>オブジェクトをパラメーターとして</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> class is a ViewEvent object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>クラスは、ViewEvent オブジェクト</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static ViewEvent fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>デリゲート メソッドを比較、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>イベントが発生したアクションの種類を決定する静的な ViewEvent フィールドにプロパティ</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>。

trans-unit.source: For example, an event is raised under the following circumstances: - You click a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: たとえば、次の状況でイベントが発生:-デザイン サーフェイス上の領域をクリックします。

trans-unit.source: - The designer draws a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: デザイナーでは、デザイン サーフェイス上のコントロールを描画します。

trans-unit.source: - You enter or exit template editing mode for a control.
trans-unit.target: に入力するか、コントロールのテンプレート編集モードを終了するとします。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>クラスは、既定値を処理するデリゲートを提供します、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName>イベント。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 。

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: カスタム コントロール デザイナーのオーバーライド、 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>、 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>、および<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>デザイン画面でコントロールのイベントを処理するメソッド</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: デザイナーのホストを初期化します、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>するオブジェクトをデザイン画面とし、パス上のアクションの種類のオブジェクト、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委任します</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>のプロパティ、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs>オブジェクトは、アクションの種類を示す: -<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click>イベント</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>。

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>イベント</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint>。

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>イベント</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>プロパティは、アクションの種類に固有のイベント引数を指定します</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for a click on a designer region.
trans-unit.target: デザイナーの領域上をクリックし、ビュー イベントが発生したことを示します。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>デリゲート メソッドを比較、 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>、静的なプロパティ<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>イベントが発生したアクションの種類を決定するフィールド</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Click to indicate that you clicked a region on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>オブジェクトがデザイン サーフェイス上の領域がクリックしたことを示すためにクリックします</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>クラスは、既定値を提供します<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委任。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 。

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Click, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: デリゲートを呼び出しますが場合は、イベントの種類をクリックして、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>メソッド</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: 派生するクラス、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>クラスのオーバーライド、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>を処理するメソッドは、デザイン時に領域上のイベントをクリックします</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: The event arguments indicate which designer region was clicked, if any.
trans-unit.target: イベント引数は、存在する場合に、どのデザイナーの領域がクリックしてされたを示します。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for drawing a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: デザイン サーフェイス上のコントロールを描画するため、ビュー イベントが発生したことを示します。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>デリゲート メソッドを比較、 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>、静的なプロパティ<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>イベントが発生したアクションの種類を決定するフィールド</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to Paint to indicate a paint event on the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>オブジェクトがデザイン サーフェイスにコントロールの描画イベントを示すために描画します</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>クラスは、既定値を提供します<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委任。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 。

trans-unit.source: If the event type is Paint, the delegate calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: イベントの種類がペイントの場合は、デリゲートを呼び出す、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>メソッド</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Classes deriving from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A> method to handle click events on a region at design time.
trans-unit.target: 派生するクラス、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>クラスのオーバーライド、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>を処理するメソッドは、デザイン時に領域上のイベントをクリックします</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a view event was raised for changing the template mode of a control designer.
trans-unit.target: コントロール デザイナーのテンプレート モードを変更するため、ビュー イベントが発生したことを示します。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method compares the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property to the static <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> fields to determine which type of action raised the event.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>デリゲート メソッドを比較、 <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A>、静的なプロパティ<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>イベントが発生したアクションの種類を決定するフィールド</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> object is equal to TemplateModeChanged to indicate that the template editing mode changed for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent>オブジェクトがデザイン サーフェイス上のコントロールのテンプレート編集モードが変更されたことを示すために TemplateModeChanged</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent> 。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>クラスは、既定値を提供します<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler>委任。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> 。

trans-unit.source: If the event type is TemplateModeChanged, the delegate sets the value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: イベントの種類が TemplateModeChanged の場合は、デリゲートの値が設定、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>プロパティ</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.InTemplateMode%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Custom designers that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner> class can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> method to perform additional processing when the template editing mode changes for a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: 派生したカスタム デザイナー、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>クラスをオーバーライドして、<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A>追加処理を実行時にテンプレートのデザイン サーフェイス上のコントロールにモードの変更を編集する方法</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 追加します。
